entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the person speaking in the conversation. He mentions that odd stuff has been happening lately.

entities.name: daily prophet
entities.description: The Daily Prophet is a newspaper that Harry mentions as publishing stories about the Dark Mark and Death Eaters.

entities.name: dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned by Harry as being featured in the Daily Prophet. It is described as an ominous symbol.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: Death Eaters are a group of dark wizards and witches that are mentioned by Harry as being associated with the Dark Mark.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is a person who is speaking in the conversation. He has mismat ched eyes and is described as having a magical eye.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder's Map is an object that Moody is looking at with his magical eye. It is mentioned as being used to track the movements of people.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is a person who is mentioned by Moody as possibly thinking along certain lines.

entities.name: rita skeeter
entities.description: Rita Skeeter is a journalist who is mentioned by Moody as helping to spread rumors.

relationships.description: Moody is looking at the Marauder's Map with his magical eye.
Crouch is possibly thinking about the Death Eaters.
Rita Skeeter is helping to spread rumors.
